documentation.text:
@notice Claim rewards.
 @dev Allows users to claim their rewards.

@notice Withdraw the fees.
 @dev Allows the owner to withdraw the totalW2Rfees and totalPenalties.

devdoc.author: Crypt0zaurus https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxence-a-a82081260
devdoc.details: This contract imports OpenZeppelin libraries, the Chainlink Aggregator V3 Interface, and the ABDKMath64x64 library.

calculateMultiplier(address,bool).details: This function calculates the multiplier based on the staker's lock-in period. The multiplier starts from 1, and depends on the lock-in period (1 month to maxLockPeriod). A precision factor is used to handle decimal values.

params.earlyUnstake: A boolean flag indicating whether the unstaking is done early or not.

returns._0: multiplier The calculated multiplier as a uint.

claimReward().details: Allows users to claim their rewards.

constructor.details: Constructor to set initial contract parameters.

params._priceFeed: The address of the Chainlink price feed contract.
params._vaultW2R: The address of the W2R vault contract.
params._w2rToken: The address of the W2R token contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newEarlyUnstakePenalty: The new early unstake penalty percentage.

stake(uint256,uint256,bool).details: Allows users to stake their W2R tokens with a specified lock period.

params._amount: The amount of W2R tokens to stake.
params._extend: Indicates if the lock period should be extended.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(uint256,bool).details: Allows users to unstake their W2R tokens with possible penalties.

params._amount: The amount of W2R tokens to unstake.
params.proportional: Indicates if the reward should be proportional to the unstaking amount.

viewReward(address).details: Allows users to view their reward without claiming.

viewRewardPercentage().details: This function uses a fake staking amount of 100 W2R to calculate the APY based on the current total staking

returns._0: apy The calculated annual percentage yield (APY) as a uint

withdrawFees().details: Allows the owner to withdraw the totalW2Rfees and totalPenalties.

devdoc.title: W2R Staking

calculateMultiplier(address,bool).notice: Calculate the reward multiplier for a given staker.

constructor.notice: Initializes the W2RStaking contract with required dependencies.

setEarlyUnstakePenalty(uint256).notice: Set the early unstake penalty percentage.

setMaxLockPeriodInMonths(uint256).notice: Set the max lock period in Months.

viewRewardPercentage().notice: Calculate the annual percentage yield (APY) for staking rewards

userdoc.notice: This contract is a staking platform for W2R tokens, allowing users to stake their tokens, claim rewards, and unstake. It includes an early unstake penalty and a reward multiplier. The contract also interacts with a W2R vault for reward distribution.
